name: Haiming Jin
content: Haiming Jin @ SJTU Haiming Jin Associate Professor å½å®¶æµ·å¤é«å±æ¬¡éå¹´äººæè®¡å Department of Computer Science and Engineering Shanghai Jiao Tong University Room 1108-2, Software Engineering Building No. 1 Dongchuan Road 800, Shanghai, China Email: jinhaiming at sjtu dot edu dot cn [Biography] [Research Interests & Openings][News] [Publications] [Teaching] [Students] [Professional Activities] Biography I am currently a tenured Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU). From January 2023 to January 2025, I was a tenure-track Associate Professor in the Department of CSE at SJTU. From August 2021 to December 2022, I was a tenure-track Associate Professor in the John Hopcroft Center (JHC) for Computer Science at SJTU. From September 2018 to August 2021, I was an assistant professor in JHC at SJTU. From June 2017 to June 2018, I was a Postdoctoral Research Associate in the Coordinated Science Laboratory (CSL) of University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), advised by Prof. R. Srikant and Prof. Klara Nahrstedt. I received my PhD degree from the Department of Computer Science of UIUC in May 2017, advised by Prof. Klara Nahrstedt. Before that, I received my Bachelor degree from the Department of Electronic Engineering of SJTU in July 2012. I am named in the 2022-2024 Stanford's list of world's top 2% scientists. Research Interests & Openings My primary research interest is wireless sensing, RF computing and applications of reinforcement learning. For any student who is interested in working with me, please feel free to shoot me an email. Students at all levels, both undergraduate and graduate students, are welcomed! News Aug. 2025: I am invited to give a talk at CNCC 2025. Aug. 2025: 2 demos accepted by MobiCom 2025 Demo Session! Congratulations to Zijie and Rong! Aug. 2025: I am invited to serve as a TPC member for ICPADS 2025. July 2025: I am invited to serve as a TPC member for TrustCom 2025. May 2025: I am invited to serve as a TPC member for INFOCOM 2026. May 2025: I am invited to serve as a TPC member for UrbComp 2025. Mar. 2025: I am invited to serve as a TPC member for ICCC 2025. Feb. 2025: I am invited to serve as a TPC member for Globecom 2025. Feb. 2025: Congratulations to Yichen for successfully defending his PhD thesis! Jan. 2025: I am promoted a Tenured Associate Professor. Jan. 2025: I am invited to serve as a Publicity and Sponsorship Chair for MobiHoc 2025.
